description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Facing Materials), 4 (Detailed Drawings), 9 (Drainage Strategy), 11 (Landscape & Planting Plan), 12 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), 13 (Cycle Parking Facilities), 28 (Ecological Mitigation and Enhancement Measures), and 30 (External Lighting) of planning permission 24/01386/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Conditions 1 (Approved plans), 10 (Sustainable Drainage Scheme) and 28 (Biodiversity and Nature Conservation) and removal of Condition 34 (Green roof) for Application Reference Number: 23/01623/FUL (Demolition of Existing blocks EFAA, EFAB, EFAC, EFAD, EFAE, EFAG and EFAH, consequential works to retained Block EFAF, and erection of two replacement three-storey school buildings including temporary teaching blocks to be used during the construction period, along with access, landscaping, and associated infrastructure.) dated 16/01/2024. Vaiation to consist of Removal of Air Source Heat Pump (ASHP) and Relocation of Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP), Removal of retaining wall & stairs (north of NB01), Removal of green roof , Change in main temporary teaching block layout.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
